  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120189</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120189</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Premikanje teles in masno središče</string>
            <string language="en">Moving Objects and Center of Mass</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegliche Nachrichten und Mitte der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Objets et centre mobiles de la masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Objetos e centro moventes da massa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Oggetti e centro commoventi di massa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κινούμενα αντικείμενα και κέντρο της μάζας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Objetos y centro móviles de la masa</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Dve telesi se premikata drug ob drugem, vendar tako, da se masno težišče ohranja.</string>
            <string language="en">Two masses are moving next to each other in a way that center of mass remains in same point.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">masno središče</string>
            <string language="en">center of mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ohranitev energije</string>
            <string language="en">conservation of energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gibalna količina</string>
            <string language="en">momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei Massen bewegen nahe bei einander in einer 
Methode, die Mitte der Masse im gleichen Punkt bleibt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les deux masses se déplacent à côté de l'un 
l'autre d'une manière dont le centre de la masse demeure dans le 
même point.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Duas massas estão movendo-se ao lado de se em 
uma maneira que o centro da massa remanesça no mesmo ponto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due masse stanno muovendosi vicino a vicenda in 
un modo che il centro di massa rimane nello stesso punto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο μάζες κινούνται η μια δίπλα στην άλλη με έναν 
τρόπο ότι το κέντρο της μάζας παραμένει στο ίδιο σημείο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos masas se están moviendo al lado de uno a de 
una manera que el centro de la masa siga siendo en la misma punta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mitte der Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieeinsparung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">centre de la masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">économie d'énergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">élan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">centro da massa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">conservation de energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">centro di massa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">conservazione di energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">quantità di moto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κέντρο της μάζας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συντήρηση της ενέργειας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ορμή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">centro de la masa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">conservación de la energía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ímpetu</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
